text:
Richard Jay Belzer (born August 4, 1944) is an American stand-up comedian, conspiracy author, and actor. He is best known for his role as John Munch, whom he has portrayed as a regular cast member on the NBC police drama series ' and '.
Belzer believes there was a conspiracy to assassinate President John F. Kennedy and has written four books discussing conspiracy theories.
Belzer is a cousin of actor Henry Winkler.
